Uses of Class
scenarios.Scenario

  • Packages that use Scenario 
    Package Description
    scenarios  

    • Uses of Scenario in scenarios

      Subclasses of Scenario in scenarios 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbandonedCargo
      AbandonedCargo class is a Scenario in which the spaceship finds a cargo hold in space and searches it to find more food and perhaps money.
      class  AbandonedShip
      AbandonedShip class is a Scenario in which the spaceship finds an abandoned spaceship and dismantles it for parts.
      class  Asteroid
      Asteroid is a Scenario in which an asteroid crashes into the ship and damages it
      class  BlackHole
      BlackHole is a Scenario in which the spaceship gets sucked into a black hole.
      class  Fire
      Fire is a scenario in which a fire somehow starts in space and burns 75% of the food supply
      class  FoodPoisoning
      FoodPoisoning is a Scenario in which one of the crew members dies from a contaminated alien meat
      class  Mutiny
      Mutiny is a Scenario in which there has been a revolt between crew members on the ship.
      class  PitStop
      PitStop is a Scenario in which the spaceship stops on a planet and find some friendly enhabitants who agree to repair the ship in exchange for one crew member.
      class  Raid
      Raid is a Scenario in which the Spaceship can decide to raid another ship or not.
      class  ScientificBreakthrough
      ScientificBreakthrough is a Scenario in which a crew member is having a scientific breakthrough and the user must answer 6 math questions in 10 seconds.
      Methods in scenarios that return Scenario 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Scenario ScenarioRunner.runScenario(Spaceship myShip)
      Constructor initializes a list of Scenarios.
